task.summary: Re-factor custom menu support into OpusPrimusNavigation class
Documented environments recommendations / requirements; and, added balance of CSS elements (read: placeholders) generated by WordPress
Add primary and secondary widget areas
Added specificity classes to link navigation functions
Add more details to widgets documentation
Make @package name consistent as 'OpusPrimus' (no underscore separation)
Make @package name consistent as 'OpusPrimus' (no underscore separation)
Added filters to _meta_tags; updated documentation; corrected filter names in _post_byline
Change apply_filters to do_action (more correct per @Otto42)
Add new class Opus Primus Social
Fleshed out _post_author; needs a lot more work ...
Add Opus Primus Enqueue Scripts function; enqueue jQuery and Custom Style Sheet
Add `get_post_format` to header, sidebar, and footer
Added placeholder elements for the post byline, modified author, and meta tags
Add LESS elements for fade styles and start Table of Contents within style.less
Fix issue with last_user no longer in database scenario.
Add clearances to LESS and .post-title element
Change DIV to P; added some LESS elements; and, added styles
Add a few general LESS items; change comment reply script hook
Basic FAQ and License Verbiage updates
Add (core) arguments and parameters to functions
More arguments and parameters; fixed div inside p issue.
Updates to 404; code clean up and documentation of classes.
Reduced naming prefixes where not required (see classes)
Added $content_width reference and a few todo items
Added default RSS widget styles; remove some comments from LESS file
Added Text Widget and Tag Cloud styles
Changed content-wrapper container to include sidebars
Modify line height in the byline and add select as a percentage (over-riding bootstrap's static width)
Re-factor entire layout code and style; add FAQ to 'readme'
Updated sidebar list styles to match new layout CSS elements
Added Single Only view filter for the Post Gallery
Specified static public for `gallery_single_only` and added $instance
Added conditional check for post-format:gallery to `gallery_single_only`
Added post-format: gallery loop (and some minor style for it)
Added `return_blank` and removed gallery filter as not needed
Added links and i18n support to the text in secondary images
Added `image_exif`; add 'image' template; adjusted post-coda style
Set featured-image img height property to auto to maintain aspect ratio
Fix aspect ratios for smaller viewport in desktop browser
Fix aspect ratios for smaller viewport in desktop browser
Make the post-format text into a button
Fix the logic to display the post-format text button correctly
Adjust layout to set min-width of the-loop=520px (needs testing); linked post-format buttons to archive; modified archive to follow standard index structure.
Changed "Posted" to "Displayed" in gallery and image loops
Modified `display_exif_*` to include dimensions; image templates code clean-up
Archive Image loop for attached images
Modified `archive_image_details` to use `get_the_ID` instead of the global $post
Establish $content_width based on columns displayed and a 1024 x 768 display
Change image template content layout to two columns
Added "Featured Image" support in the "standard" loop but not in single view.
Add drop shadows to gallery images via js; change 'fitvids' and 'opus-primus' js enqueue location to footer
Updated JS to add drop shadows to more images
Add 'Merienda' font and use with Post-Format: Quote; another JetPack CSS hack added
Adjusted Post-Format: Quote font-size based on view (see all posts, single, and archive)
Add 'fitText.js'; add 'opus-primus-status.php'; added `status_update`; added CSS to make it all work.
Modify fitText constrictor value; adjust placement of status update message; add archive-status template
Moved 'comments' CSS container to wrap all output
Added Comments Class and applied to 'comments.php'
Clean up 'comments' and start "new" comment styles
Move single post navigation links to bottom of page
Added HR and styles for post navigation links
Use theme version via `wp_get_theme` in enqueue calls
Move .post-coda style from LESS to CSS
Set custom style sheet enqueue version based on theme version
Remove jQuery wraps from footer elements; adjust relevant CSS
Add 'extras' for work in progress items and other wildly outlandish ideas
Removed initial zoom factor from header; added responsive-layout stylesheet; added protofluid script for testing RWD
Cleared CSS used to fix multiple share icons
Remove extra span in header group
Note where closing tags are opened
Re-factor header templates to include the complete <header> container; change container #opus to #opus-primus (no effect)
Moved `body_classes` function from 'functions.php' to the Structures class
Move browser title restructure functions from 'functions' to Structures class
Increase font size of link anchor text in post-format: link
Add audio-symbol class wrapper for anchor elements in post-format: audio
Added conditional isset tests on the $post indices being used to save with; fixes new post/page errors
Fix first and last day of week border issue if they are noted as "today"
Add filters to exif message texts
Added dynamic filter to tagline output key to post ID
Add modified author classes; add sanity checks to make sure there are posts when calling the archive templates
Modified author coda, again ... and again
Code comments and additional code formatting
Add post author details logic to show only those set to true (default)
Add Pull Quotes as an Extension

Added `uncategorized` to test for use of the default category named as "Uncategorized" and not display it if it is the only category used for a post; minor CSS adjustment (border-top) added to `p.meta-tags`
Added todo - sort out Posted always being used in meta-tags output
Fixed non-matching $anchor values used in post_byline and meta_tags
i18n updates to 'sticky_flag' and documentation updates
Renamed search_results to no_search_results and added several filters to change text strings being outputted
Added widget areas to before and after the_Loop on all templates (index, archive, author, image, page, search, and single)
Added template file 'sidebar-header.php'; added three widget horizontal areas above menu in header
Update Copyright years as needed; added note to this effect in 'readme.txt'
Added note regarding the use of get_post_type in the_Loop
Extracted the_Loop (most basic form) into a new Structures class method and replaced where appropriate in standard template files.
Updated Copyright year on edited files to 2012-2013 from 2012 only
Fix JavaScript issue with calling fitVids when not implemented ... can you say dumb-ass?!
Removed class OpusPrimusSocial (probably served better by plugins)
* Added Underwood Champion font for use with the Post-Format: Chat * Re-organized the fonts folder * Added CSS for Post-Format: Chat * Updated 'readme' with Underwood Champion attribution / license

* Use JavaScript to add a class to the code box used with `form-allowed-tags` class * Add CSS to use new JavaScript added class * Code formatting and organization of Comments class to separate the actions and filters from the other methods
* Refactor to test conditional `is_single` within the `secondary_images` method; documentation updates
* Change where conditional checks for `is_single` are made and add additional check if posts are found in the secondary images query
* Fixed issues with Post-Format: Gallery when images are not attached to post
* Set all sidebar background colors to transparent (leave base layout stylesheet as is from initial testing)
Added block termination comments to code (theme root level files)
Added block termination comments to code (header and footer files)
Added block termination comments to code (Archives)
Added block termination comments to code (Authors)
Added block termination comments to code (Comments)
